name: Visualisation of geolocation information
description: Presenting points or paths visually using extracted data, typically on a map
references: Magnet 2020, Using the Geolocation Data Filter in Magnet AXIOM & AXIOM Cyber, https://www.magnetforensics.com/blog/using-the-geolocation-data-filter-in-magnet-axiom-axiom-cyber/
Magnet 2024, Moving in the right direction with Animated maps, https://www.magnetforensics.com/blog/moving-in-the-right-direction-with-animated-maps/
Basis Technology 2020, Autopsy User Documentation: Geolocation Overview, https://sleuthkit.org/autopsy/docs/user-docs/4.13.0/geolocation_page.html
